talk.utter: I am filled with great sympathy, will probably be appalled as I read further, and am simultaneously filled with nostalgia for some really weird fanart I've seen.

talk.author: did:plc:uhem3syhpcqxen6pfxqu752v
talk.utter: Given the content of this thread, I feel I ought to clarify I mean "weird" in the sense of "huh, you've anthropomorphized these different strains of modern literary theory really well," not the kind of weird that drives moderators to drink.
